content:
In implementing the smart-configuration file output the metadata and the example response have different names for token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported (sample response) or token_endpoint_auth_methods (metadata definition above it)
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/smart-app-launch/conformance.html#metadata
@Josh Mandel any thoughts? - Log it?
(demo server at https://launch.smarthealthit.org/v/r4/fhir/.well-known/smart-configuration has token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported)
This came up in ballot comments; proposed resolution (namely: fix to say token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported, per OIDC) at FHIR-27831
